document_data.name: Aaronarra
document_data.age: [[Dragon aging|Very old]]Aaronarra is listed as "old" in ''[[Dragons of Faerûn]]'' (p. 146). However, he is stated to be over 700 years old in ''[[Elminster's Ecologies Appendix II]]'' ("The High Moor", p. 28), which would make him "very old" according to the age categories outlined in ''[[Draconomicon: The Book of Dragons]]'' (p. 10–15). This article assumes the ''Dragons of Faerûn'' listing is in error.
document_data.mainbody: '''Aaronarra''' was a [[copper dragon]] living on the western side of the [[High Moor]], near the [[Misty Forest]], at the end of the 14th century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was around 700 years old in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Aaronarra was known for having a bad attitude. The [[druid]] [[Bara (druid)|Bara]] described him as both crotchety and sarcastic. For food, Aaronarra selected creatures whose populations could reasonably be reduced, such as [[goblin]]s.
